My favorite conspiracy so far in 2020 is pedophile 1% putting humans & pedophile codes onto Toaster Strudel boxes and into McDonalds McMuffins. 

This surpasses my 2019 favorite conspiracy with TI & Alex Jones saying the new Beyond Meat veggie burgers are made from humans too.

When you see multiple fast food places having vegan options, it appears that progress is being made- which is great

But what about all of the livestock they need to support the other 99% of their menu? 

#wednesdaymorning #WednesdayThoughts #vegan #beyondmeat
